themes.scientific_basis: Based on emotional intelligence research and Mayer-Salovey's EI framework for understanding emotions
themes.description: Evaluates partners' ability to identify and understand their own emotional states, including awareness of emotional triggers and patterns

themes.scientific_basis: Grounded in Bren√© Brown's research on vulnerability and its role in emotional connection
themes.description: Measures partners' willingness and ability to share deeper emotions and personal insecurities with each other

themes.scientific_basis: Based on empathy research and studies on emotional attunement in relationships
themes.description: Assesses how well partners understand and connect with each other's emotional experiences, including nonverbal emotional cues

themes.scientific_basis: Derived from research on emotional expression styles and gender differences in emotional communication
themes.description: Examines different ways partners express emotions and how they navigate varying comfort levels with emotional expression

themes.scientific_basis: Based on attachment theory and research on emotional security in adult relationships
themes.description: Evaluates the degree of emotional safety partners feel when sharing feelings, including trust in emotional responses

themes.scientific_basis: Grounded in validation research and Linehan's work on emotional validation in relationships
themes.description: Measures how effectively partners validate each other's emotional experiences without judgment or minimization

themes.scientific_basis: Based on research on mixed emotions and managing emotional complexity in relationships
themes.description: Assesses how couples handle complex or contradictory emotions, including situations where partners have different emotional responses

themes.scientific_basis: Derived from narrative therapy research and studies on emotional processing of past experiences
themes.description: Examines how couples understand and integrate past emotional experiences into their current relationship dynamic

themes.scientific_basis: Based on growth mindset theory applied to emotional development in relationships
themes.description: Evaluates how partners support each other's emotional growth and learning, including developing new emotional skills together

themes.scientific_basis: Grounded in emotion regulation research and studies on co-regulation in relationships
themes.description: Measures how couples help each other process and recover from intense emotional experiences, including stress and distress
